Posts.Content: tam61 wrote: Just got my pathology report after biopsy - High grade intraductal carcinoma focally extending to within 1 mm of closest margin, Focal non expansive central necrosis er/pr negative.  Any thought on proceeding to lumpectomy or mastectomy?  Seems the high grade & & margins but me at higher rick for recurrence.  Thanks for any advice on moving forward. Posts.Content: Sep 16, 2014 08:53AM tam61 wrote: Thanks Peggy - I am also er-/pr- and that seems to be more aggressive - so I am leaning toward mastectomy with reconstruction.
